value: 'KENOGO' SUITE 101 13 BOWDEN STREET, ALEXANDRIA, 2015, NSW, Australia

7999 - Amusement and Recreation Services, Not Elsewhere Classified Summary > LOTTOLAND AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover amusement and recreation services, not elsewhere classified. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. LOTTOLAND AUSTRALIA PTY LTD is headquartered in Alexandria, New South Wales. It is headed by director Luke Horton Brill. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $39.59 million. Its net loss totalled $3.00 million. LOTTOLAND AUSTRALIA PTY LTD forms part of the services industry sector. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
